question: 25) LIFE SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following is an example of chemosynthesis? W) A Venus flytrap breaking down the phosphates in a fly X) A plant obtaining fixated nitrogen from bacteria rich soil Y) Prokaryotes [proh-KAR-ee-ohts] obtaining energy from sulfur compounds from the sea vents on the ocean floor Z) A human being breaking down vitamins and minerals for metabolic digestion
answer:
Y) PROKARYOTES OBTAINING ENERGY FROM SULFUR COMPOUNDS FROM
THE SEA VENTS ON THE OCEAN FLOOR
